My friend Sarah is 30 years old whereas her boyfriend is 26 years old. So It's totally fine ! Sarah honours her parents and is thankful for what they have done for her. Her brother is also a good son while her sister needs to be a better daughter. In the east parents and teachers stress the importance of filial piety which means chinese parental respect. They teach that you should honour your parents and take care of them. Two weeks ago Sarah's cousin stole her Chanel watchband so it was a question of honour to tell her about it. My brother was honour bound to tell her too. Her dad is a man of honour and high integrity. Both of us are kickboxing fans. Fred will be fighting Mark for the heavyweight title in February for the honour of his country. Winning this championship is a matter of personal honour, family honour and national honour. Last Tuesday Fred's church held a banquet in honour of Fred. Sarah asked if I would do her the honour of accompanying her to the banquet which I did. It was a great honour to meet Fred. When Fred saw us he said humbly "It's a signal honour to have you here Sarah" We asked him whether he could become our kickboxing coach. He said "I'll have to see" A couple of waitresses did the honours and greeted the guests at the door. After we sat down Fred said to a waiter "Will you do the honours and cut us a piece of chicken?" He said to us "I would be honoured if you would come and see my fight against Mark in February" We gave him an affirmative response. Last year Dana said to him "I would be honoured if you attended the hall of fame ceremony" which he did. He was honoured for his performance in his last fight. He was honoured with an award for excellence in wrestling. By the way loads of people bought front row ticket for the next kickboxing event at half price or less due to a computer error but the organisation stated that they would honour these tickets nevertheless which could cost up to five hundred thousand dollars in lost earnings. Sarah's cousin Tom isn't very well-to-do whereas his girlfriend's family is very well-off. Last Saturday he gave a party where cheap wines were served. The sofas in his apartment are made of some cheap material. His television is cheap and nasty. As some of us wanted to watch the news I said "if I could just turn on the television please" He then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel" Tom's recently got some new clothes on the cheap from a shop facing possible liquidation. He bought a pair of cheap sneakers that fell apart after a couple months so I bought him a pair of good quality ones. He's too cheap to buy new trainers. He's very cheap with the air conditioner too- it's only on for an hour and he turns on the fans and opens the windows instead but the air conditioner was dirt cheap. He vacationed in Macau the other week but he's so mean he didn't even buy us postcards. He stayed at a three star hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. Tom is a cornetist. He explained to us regarding a piece by Ravel "This passage should be played lyrically rather than rhythmically. quote.msg: My friend Sarah is 30 years old whereas her boyfriend is 26 years old. So It's totally fine ! Sarah honours her parents and is thankful for what they have done for her. Her brother is also a good son while her sister needs to be a better daughter. In the east parents and teachers stress the importance of filial piety which means chinese parental respect. They teach that you should honour your parents and take care of them. Two weeks ago Sarah's cousin stole her Chanel watchband so it was a question of honour to tell her about it. My brother was honour bound to tell her too. Her dad is a man of honour and high integrity. Both of us are kickboxing fans. Fred will be fighting Mark for the heavyweight title in February for the honour of his country. Winning this championship is a matter of personal honour, family honour and national honour. Last Tuesday Fred's church held a banquet in honour of Fred. Sarah asked if I would do her the honour of accompanying her to the banquet which I did. It was a great honour to meet Fred. When Fred saw us he said humbly "It's a signal honour to have you here Sarah" We asked him whether he could become our kickboxing coach. He said "I'll have to see" A couple of waitresses did the honours and greeted the guests at the door. After we sat down Fred said to a waiter "Will you do the honours and cut us a piece of chicken?" He said to us "I would be honoured if you would come and see my fight against Mark in February" We gave him an affirmative response. Last year Dana said to him "I would be honoured if you attended the hall of fame ceremony" which he did. He was honoured for his performance in his last fight. He was honoured with an award for excellence in wrestling. By the way loads of people bought front row ticket for the next kickboxing event at half price or less due to a computer error but the organisation stated that they would honour these tickets nevertheless which could cost up to five hundred thousand dollars in lost earnings. Sarah's cousin Tom isn't very well-to-do whereas his girlfriend's family is very well-off. Last Saturday he gave a party where cheap wines were served. The sofas in his apartment are made of some cheap material. His television is cheap and nasty. As some of us wanted to watch the news I said "if I could just turn on the television please" He then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel" Tom's recently got some new clothes on the cheap from a shop facing possible liquidation. He bought a pair of cheap sneakers that fell apart after a couple months so I bought him a pair of good quality ones. He's too cheap to buy new trainers. He's very cheap with the air conditioner too- it's only on for an hour and he turns on the fans and opens the windows instead but the air conditioner was dirt cheap. He vacationed in Macau the other week but he's so mean he didn't even buy us postcards. He stayed at a three star hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. Tom is a cornetist. He explained to us regarding a piece by Ravel "This passage should be played lyrically rather than rhythmically. Otherwise it's a bit cheap" I saw lots of his pencil marks on the score such as: cantabile, silence, no pause here, clean pedal, just separate, more melodic voicing, remain soft, stay soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time....Regarding teaching he said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay monthly or for four lessons at a time. For this month it's ok to pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis since you might wanna see what it's like to have lessons. From next month onwards pay monthly. Students of all standards are welcome. I'm also an accompanist who accompanies singers for live performances. Some of my students started learning cornet when they were eighteen. Their fingers are less dextrous and slower than say a ten year old kid.

Tom is thirty years old while his girlfriend is forty years old. We watched a kickboxing match in which Paul hit Chris with a cheap shot after he lost to Chris. We watched a comedy show as well which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for his vulgar manner and wearing vulgar suit. His granddad was a cheap gangster and liar. His jokes and jibes were cheap and vulgar. By the way Channel one gives live coverage of kickboxing matches. John's fight against Alan received wide press coverage. His match against Joe also got in-depth media coverage. He tends to get lots of newspaper and magazine coverage because his fights are exciting to watch. Tomorrow the organisation will be holding a chairmanship election. Channel two will be giving the election extensive coverage. If you wanna check out the reports of his previous matches their monthly magazines have detailed coverage of them. The book "martial arts styles" provides good kickboxing techniques coverage. By the way Japan mobile now has worldwide coverage with its network which far outshines other service providers. Its network coverage used to be poor in Fukuoka but today it's regarded as one of the best in the world. Its coverage is fantastic throughout the country. My friend Paul is looking at a few insurance plans and choosing one which provides the most adequate life, medical and health insurance coverage. He's also thinking of paying an additional premium to have cover for accidental damage to his tuba as well as increasing the coverage up to one million yen. Channel three gives detailed coverage of NBA matches. Bulls' game against Suns got widespread media coverage. Rockets' game against Raptors also received in-depth press coverage. Raptors and Lakers tend to get lots of television and newspaper coverage because they are exciting to watch. Tomorrow NBA will be holding a chairmanship election. Channel four will give the election extensive coverage. If you wanna check out the reports of Lakers' previous final games, the NBA monthly magazines have wide coverage of them. The book "basketball techniques" provides good coverage of dunking techniques.

replies.msg: 0/10 Would really help if you can stick to one narrative, avoid repeating 'by the way' and blatant plagiarism.
